entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.19.1
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Fix UI glitch in light theme on some OS settings (#434) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.19.2
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Fix: Custom email sending as non-admin user (#436) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.20.0
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🚀 Features

  • Provide a hyperlink to the official book provider website (#444) by @adityachandelgit
  • Implement GitHub Star Prompt via Topbar (#446) by @adityachandelgit

✨ Dependencies

  • Update Spring Boot Stack to Latest Stable Versions (June 2025) (#442) by @adityachandelgit
  • Upgrade Angular Packages to Latest Versions (June 2025) (#441) by @adityachandelgit

📖 Documentation

  • Merge Develop into Master for Release (#447) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.21.0
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🚀 Features

  • Add 4th Priority (P4) Support to Metadata Fetch Options (#449) by @adityachandelgit

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Accordion component no longer works after upgrading to the latest Pri… (#455) by @adityachandelgit

🛠️ Refactoring & Maintenance

  • Migrate existing control flow directives to use new control-flow sche… (#453) by @adityachandelgit
  • Separate metadata settings into a dedicated tab (#451) by @adityachandelgit

📖 Documentation

  • Merge Develop into Master for Release (#456) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.22.0
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🚀 Features

  • Link author and genre clicks to filtered book list (#458) by @adityachandelgit

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Books incorrectly marked as fully locked when no locked fields are pr… (#464) by @adityachandelgit
  • Sorting Error in Book Series with More Than 9 Volumes (#463) by @adityachandelgit
  • Fix: Sorting breaks with active filters (#461) by @adityachandelgit

📖 Documentation

  • Merge Develop into Master for Release (#465) by @adityachandelgit
